GameComponents

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameComponents.Square

  • public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a square on the ricochet robots game board
    Author:
    Mitch Powell

    • Constructor Detail

      • Square

        public Square(int xLocation,
              int yLocation,
              boolean center,
              boolean occupant,
              boolean north,
              boolean south,
              boolean east,
              boolean west)
        Constructor for the Square class
        Parameters:
        xLocation - The X-Coordinate
        yLocation - The Y-Coordinate
        center - Describes whether or not the square resides in the center of the board
        occupant - Whether or not there is a robot in the square
        north - True if the northern border is blocked
        south - True if the southern border is blocked
        east - True if the eastern border is blocked
        west - True if the western border is blocked
